products.title: Amazon Acacia Real Wood
products.description: Their premium amazon acacia real wood blind is a stunning warm mid grey shade, great for incorporating subtle earthy shades within the home. From soft stained brown, painted creamy neutrals to textured fine grains, this real wood range creates a natural chic finish to your windows. Product id: sdb-wsb0562 fabric colour: acacia material: bass wood headrail: high quality headrail with top or face fix brackets and matching pelmet slat width: 50mm slat material: stained finish control type: co-ordinated raise & tilt dual cords with matching toggles energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes amazon acacia real wood in grey.

products.description: Carnival blackout acacia made to measure roller blind.

products.title: Sunwood Acacia Venetian Blind
products.description: Sunwood is a quality range of wooden venetian blinds. Available in 10 colours. Looking for a beautiful beige wood blind? The sunwood acacia venetian blind is perfect, now with free delvery on orders over 145 at kingston blinds direct.

products.title: Amazon Taped Acacia Real Wood
products.description: Their premium amazon taped acacia real wood blind is a stunning warm mid grey shade, great for incorporating subtle earthy shades within the home. From soft stained brown, painted creamy neutrals to textured fine grains, this real wood range creates a natural chic finish to your windows. This blind is finished with a luxury tape to complete the look. Product id: sdb-wsb0778 fabric colour: acacia material: bass wood headrail: high quality headrail with top or face fix brackets and matching pelmet slat width: 50mm slat material: stained finish control type: co-ordinated raise & tilt dual cords with matching toggles energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention tape colour: dove light filtering: yes amazon taped acacia real wood in grey.

products.title: Bosworth Acacia Roman Blind
products.description: Bosworth is a patterned fabric which comes in 4 very beautiful soft colours. The modern geometric pattern of thiscream roller blind will add a stylish touch to any room in your home. Product id: db-rom0616 fabric colour: acacia material: 100% cotton lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets. Control type: smooth chain operation - great for a durable, even finish energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes bosworth acacia roman blind in grey/green/multicoloured.

products.title: Sunwood Acacia With Truffle Tapes Venetian Blind
products.description: Sunwood is a quality range of wooden venetian blinds with decorative tapes. Available in 10 colours. The sunwood acacia with truffle tapes venetian blind is a modern wood blind. Now with free delivery on orders over 145, only at kingston blinds direct.

products.title: Sunwood Acacia With Gallant Tapes Venetian Blind
products.description: Sunwood is a quality range of wooden venetian blinds with decorative tapes. Available in 10 colours. The sunwood acacia with gallant tapes venetian blind has a contrasting tape colour to make an bold statement in any room. Only at kingston blinds direct.

products.title: Sunwood Acacia With Dove Tapes Venetian Blind
products.description: Sunwood is a quality range of wooden venetian blinds with decorative tapes. Available in 10 colours. The contemporary sunwood acacia with dove tapes venetian blind, now comes with free delivery on orders over 145, only at kingston blinds direct. Order now.

products.title: Acacia Dove Grey Roman Blind
products.description: Bring the outdoors in with the acacia dove grey roman blind in a smart grey. Custom made from textured fabric highlighted with sprinkles of metallic, weve hand picked this collection to boost not only warmth in your room, but also to add a style youll be appreciative of in years to come. Product id: db-rom1089 fabric colour: dove grey material: 56% polyester 44% cotton lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

products.title: Acacia Brown Roman Blind
products.description: Furnish your home with refinement by selecting the acacia brown roman blind in an elegant fabric accented with hints of metallic. Hand selected in a textile that not only breathes well due to its cotton blend, it also cascades over your window with minimal creasing. Dont say we dont think of everything. You wont be disappointed in your choice. Product id: db-rom1090 fabric colour: brown material: 56% polyester 44% cotton lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.
